attributes.action: Resignation of David Cameron, Vote of no confidence in our leadership
attributes.additional_details:
Afghanistan...over $1 trillion worth off rare minerals found not to mention casualties
Iraq... Oil, gold etc...weapons of mass destruction never found yet over 5 million casualties
Libya....,Somalia....,Palestine...,Syria...funny how Mr Cameron never got involved with British beheadings by jihadi John nor when ISIS attacked British holiday makers in Tunisia ...surprise surprise wonder what one of his first targets were...

Haven't got money for public that require it and plenty of cut backs yet war "yes please"
attributes.background: Time after time we are being pushed aside even though we are a "democratic society" time and time again we get dragged into wars and don't help ourselves or where it's really needed in the world ...for agendas beyond our understanding and being misled into divide and conquer enough is enough
